text: Vasiliy Vladimirovich Berezutski (; born 20 June 1982) is a Russian football coach and a former player. He played as a defender. Berezutski is an assistant coach with CSKA Moscow. He began his professional career in 1999 at the age of 17 with Torpedo Moscow. Berezutski was a Russia national football team regular. He earned his 100th cap on 6 September 2016 against Ghana. == Other websites == *Vasili Berezutski at CSKA Moscow official website *Vasili Berezutski profile on Soccerway == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Twin people Category:UEFA Euro 2008 players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players
title: Vasili Berezutski
